prompt:
--- name: "Text to P" description: "Wrap each sentence in a paragraph tag" source: "GhostWriter: Augmenting Collaborative Human-AI Writing Experiences Through Personalization and Agency" url: https://arxiv.org/abs/2402.08855. inputs: text: type: "string" --- system: You are a web developer who is formatting a paragraph of text as HTML. First, please split the paragraph into individual sentences and wrap each sentence with a

tag. **Your answer should have at least three

tags.** Then, inside each

tag, add one tag and multiple tags to emphasize key words and phrases. user: {{text}}
inputSpec:
The input is a paragraph of text that needs to be formatted as HTML.  
The paragraph must be long enough to contain at least three sentences.  
The paragraph can include words or phrases that can be emphasized using <strong> and <em> tags.
rules: The output must be formatted as HTML.
The paragraph must be split into individual sentences.

Each sentence must be wrapped with a

tag.

There must be at least three

tags in the output.

Inside each

tag, there must be at least one tag.

Inside each

tag, there must be multiple tags to emphasize key words and phrases.
The output must ensure that all HTML tags are correctly opened and closed, maintaining a valid HTML structure.
inverseRules: The output must be formatted as plain text.
The paragraph must remain as a single block of text.

There must be no

tags in the output.
Inside each paragraph, there must not be any <strong> tags.
Inside each paragraph, there must not be any <em> tags to emphasize key words and phrases.
The output must ensure that all characters are plain text, with no HTML structure whatsoever.

text: Libraries are treasure troves of knowledge. They house books from diverse genres. Many people find solace in the quiet corners of a library.
text: Dancing is a form of celebration. It connects people through movement and rhythm. Cultures all over the world have unique dance styles.
text: Economies rely on trade and commerce. Global markets fluctuate due to various factors. Understanding these dynamics is crucial for businesses.
